settings.title: Neato Settings
settings.warning: Something went wrong, please try again

auth.connected_with: Currently you are logged in with this Neato Robotics account
auth.authorize_intro: To give Homey access to your Neato account, click the button below!
auth.authorize_notice: If you cannot login with a new account. Try logging in to My Neato and revoke our application access on the 'Edit Account' page.
auth.deauthorize_notice: Note: It's not possible for us to completely revoked our access. We throw do away the key but if you don't trust us, you can revoke our access on the 'Edit Account' page on My Neato.
auth.deauthorize_intro: If you want to disconnect Homey from your Neato account, click the button below.
auth.authorize: Authorize Homey to use your Neato account!
